title: WorkEnvelopeValidator C-axis Limits + Fixture Height
scope: Fix C-001 (C-axis rotary limits) and C-002 (fixture_height_mm in Z limit)

findings.title: C-axis rotary limits not checked in WorkEnvelopeValidator
findings.fix: Added C_min_deg/C_max_deg to AxisLimits interface + validation at lines 148-158

findings.title: fixture_height_mm not included in Z-axis limit check
findings.fix: Added fixture_height_mm to zMinEffective calculation at line 82

spot_checks.expected: C_min_deg and C_max_deg checked when present

spot_checks.actual: Line 82: const zMinEffective = effLimits.Z_min + input.tool_length_mm + input.fixture_height_mm
